verses.verse: The word<WH1697> which came unto Jeremiah<WH3414> from the LORD<WH3068> in the days<WH3117> of Jehoiakim<WH3079> the son<WH1121> of Josiah<WH2977> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063>, saying<WH559>,

Go<WH1980> unto the house<WH1004> of the Rechabites<WH7397>, and speak<WH1696> unto them, and bring<WH935> them into the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068>, into one<WH259> of the chambers<WH3957>, and give them wine<WH3196> to drink<WH8248>.

Then I took<WH3947> Jaazaniah<WH2970> the son<WH1121> of Jeremiah<WH3414>, the son<WH1121> of Habaziniah<WH2262>, and his brethren<WH251>, and all his sons<WH1121>, and the whole house<WH1004> of the Rechabites<WH7397>;

And I brought<WH935> them into the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068>, into the chamber<WH3957> of the sons<WH1121> of Hanan<WH2605>, the son<WH1121> of Igdaliah<WH3012>, a man<WH376> of God<WH430>, which was by<WH681> the chamber<WH3957> of the princes<WH8269>, which was above<WH4605> the chamber<WH3957> of Maaseiah<WH4641> the son<WH1121> of Shallum<WH7967>, the keeper<WH8104> of the door<WH5592>: door: Heb. threshold, or, vessel

And I set<WH5414> before<WH6440> the sons<WH1121> of the house<WH1004> of the Rechabites<WH7397> pots<WH1375> full<WH4392> of wine<WH3196>, and cups<WH3563>, and I said<WH559> unto them, Drink<WH8354> ye wine<WH3196>.

But they said<WH559>, We will drink<WH8354> no wine<WH3196>: for Jonadab<WH3122> the son<WH1121> of Rechab<WH7394> our father<WH1> commanded<WH6680> us, saying<WH559>, Ye shall drink<WH8354> no wine<WH3196>, neither ye, nor your sons<WH1121> for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>:

Neither shall ye build<WH1129> house<WH1004>, nor sow<WH2232> seed<WH2233>, nor plant<WH5193> vineyard<WH3754>, nor have any: but all your days<WH3117> ye shall dwell<WH3427> in tents<WH168>; that ye may live<WH2421> many<WH7227> days<WH3117> in<WH6440> the land<WH127> where ye be strangers<WH1481>.

Thus have we obeyed<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of Jonadab<WH3082> the son<WH1121> of Rechab<WH7394> our father<WH1> in all that he hath charged<WH6680> us, to drink<WH8354> no wine<WH3196> all our days<WH3117>, we, our wives<WH802>, our sons<WH1121>, nor our daughters<WH1323>;
Nor to build<WH1129> houses<WH1004> for us to dwell in<WH3427>: neither have we vineyard<WH3754>, nor field<WH7704>, nor seed<WH2233>:
But we have dwelt in<WH3427> tents<WH168>, and have obeyed<WH8085>, and done<WH6213> according to all that Jonadab<WH3122> our father<WH1> commanded<WH6680> us.

But it came to pass, when Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> came up<WH5927> into the land<WH776>, that we said<WH559>, Come<WH935>, and let us go<WH935> to Jerusalem<WH3389> for fear<WH6440> of the army<WH2428> of the Chaldeans<WH3778>, and for fear<WH6440> of the army<WH2428> of the Syrians<WH758>: so we dwell<WH3427> at Jerusalem<WH3389>.
Then came the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> unto Jeremiah<WH3414>, saying<WH559>,

Thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>; Go<WH1980> and tell<WH559> the men<WH376> of Judah<WH3063> and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, Will ye not receive<WH3947> instruction<WH4148> to hearken<WH8085> to my words<WH1697>? saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>.

The words<WH1697> of Jonadab<WH3082> the son<WH1121> of Rechab<WH7394>, that he commanded<WH6680> his sons<WH1121> not to drink<WH8354> wine<WH3196>, are performed<WH6965>; for unto this day<WH3117> they drink<WH8354> none, but obey<WH8085> their father's<WH1> commandment<WH4687>: notwithstanding I have spoken<WH1696> unto you, rising early<WH7925> and speaking<WH1696>; but ye hearkened<WH8085> not unto me.

I have sent<WH7971> also unto you all my servants<WH5650> the prophets<WH5030>, rising up early<WH7925> and sending<WH7971> them, saying<WH559>, Return<WH7725> ye now every man<WH376> from his evil<WH7451> way<WH1870>, and amend<WH3190> your doings<WH4611>, and go<WH3212> not after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430> to serve<WH5647> them, and ye shall dwell in<WH3427> the land<WH127> which I have given<WH5414> to you and to your fathers<WH1>: but ye have not inclined<WH5186> your ear<WH241>, nor hearkened<WH8085> unto me.

Because the sons<WH1121> of Jonadab<WH3082> the son<WH1121> of Rechab<WH7394> have performed<WH6965> the commandment<WH4687> of their father<WH1>, which he commanded<WH6680> them; but this people<WH5971> hath not hearkened<WH8085> unto me:

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>; Behold, I will bring<WH935> upon Judah<WH3063> and upon all the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389> all the evil<WH7451> that I have pronounced<WH1696> against them: because I have spoken<WH1696> unto them, but they have not heard<WH8085>; and I have called<WH7121> unto them, but they have not answered<WH6030>.

And Jeremiah<WH3414> said<WH559> unto the house<WH1004> of the Rechabites<WH7397>, Thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>; Because ye have obeyed<WH8085> the commandment<WH4687> of Jonadab<WH3082> your father<WH1>, and kept<WH8104> all his precepts<WH4687>, and done<WH6213> according unto all that he hath commanded<WH6680> you:

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>; Jonadab<WH3122> the son<WH1121> of Rechab<WH7394> shall not want<WH3772> a man<WH376> to stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> me for ever<WH3117>. Jonadab: Heb. There shall not a man be cut off from Jonadab the son of Rechab to stand, etc
